# availableModes

**Instance Property**

The display modes that can be associated with the screen.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var availableModes: [UIScreenMode] { get }
```

## Discussion

The array contains one or more [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIScreenMode] objects, each of which represents a display mode supported by the screen.

## Managing screen modes

- **currentMode**: The current screen mode associated with the screen.
- **preferredMode**: The preferred display mode for the screen.
